question:
Which of the following statements conform to the various provisions of the Constitution of India?
  1. All money bills can originate in Lok Sabha Only
  2. Resolution of removal of Vice President can originate in Rajya Sabha Only
  3. No confidence motion against council of Ministers is exclusive power of Lok Sabha
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All are correct statements. Kindly go through the fundamentals again if you have any doubts.
